original_text: So Balaam returned to Balak. Balak was still standing by his burnt offering with all the Moabite officers.
korean_text: 그가 발락에게로 돌아간즉 발락과 모압의 모든 고관이 번제물 곁에 함께 섰더라

sentences.original_text: Balak was still standing by his burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 발락은 여전히 그의 번제물 곁에 서 있었습니다
